sentences.english: Performance track and performace result application must be proceeding.
sentences.chinese: 進行績效追蹤與績效結果應用。

sentences.english: Performance track and performace result application must be proceeding.
sentences.chinese: 進行績效追蹤與績效結果應用。

sentences.english: High performing teams do an excellent job of "on-boarding" the new team member(s).
sentences.chinese: 高績效團隊在幫助新人融入方面也做得很出色。

sentences.english: These are the fruits of high performance.
"Completion date issue date, date date high-ching" is the performance criteria.
sentences.chinese: “日事日畢，日清日高”是績效準則。

sentences.english: The lowliest place elimination series are the achievements inspection one system.
sentences.chinese: 末位淘汰制是績效考覈的一種制度走廊頂裝修效果圖。

sentences.english: To qualify excellent elementary school principal brand could be considered.
sentences.chinese: 辦理優質品牌校長認證，全面提升國民小學經營績效。

sentences.english: Monitor each club's performance with respect to service projects.
sentences.chinese: 督導各社在服務計劃方面之績效。

sentences.english: The evaluation of performance of CRMs is belong to the evaluation of informationization.
sentences.chinese: 客戶關係管理系統的績效評價屬於企業信息化的範疇。

sentences.english: The performance wage system of the investment banking headquarters has come to a crossroad.
sentences.chinese: 投資銀行總部的績效工資制已走到了一個十字路口。

sentences.english: New Zealand was an early adopter of a performance-based building code in 1992.
sentences.chinese: 新西蘭早在1992年就接受了基於績效的建築規範。

sentences.english: Steading the developing performance for a new founded metal trading company.
sentences.chinese: 使一個剛成立的金屬貿易公司的績效穩步發展。

sentences.english: Refer to the Performance Evaluation Sheet.
sentences.chinese: 參照公司另行制定的績效考覈表。

sentences.english: Effective evaluation of job performance is an on-going process.
sentences.chinese: 有效的工作績效評價是一項持續的過程。

sentences.english: Cost-cutting measures are planned to beef up performance.
sentences.chinese: 爲了提高績效，正在計劃降低成本。

sentences.english: Chapter 4 makes a positive study of divestiture performance of the listed-company.
sentences.chinese: 第四章做了一個上市公司資產剝離的市場績效分析。

definition: employee/person employed in a trade or profession
